Build id: I20070319-1800 + Latest org.eclipse.pde.ui/org.eclipse.pde.core from HEAD

1. Run a runtime Eclipse application.
2. Every time you close a plug-in manifest editor, you get the error pasted below.  
The problem started occurring after applying the patch in bug 177590.

Tom, is this error legitimate or bogus?  The code compiles fine at dev time.
